Module schach
Package schach.controller

Class Check

  • java.lang.Object
    • schach.controller.Check
  • public class Check
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Check contains methods and information to search for and keep control of check- and checkmate situations

      • updateKings

        public void updateKings()
        Searches for Kings on the board and saves them in the class fields

      • searchKing

        protected Piece searchKing​(boolean isWhite)
        Searches the king of a given color on the board
        Parameters:
        isWhite - true if wanted king is white, false if black
        Returns:
        Piece King of wanted color, null if no king of given color found

      • kingInCheck

        public boolean kingInCheck​(boolean isWhite)
        Checks if king of a given color is attacked in a given situation
        Parameters:
        isWhite - true if king is white, false if black //@param currentlyAttackedSquares List of squares that are under attack in the given situation
        Returns:
        true if king is in check, false if not TODO resolve parameter (does it work that way?)

      • inCheckIfMoved

        public boolean inCheckIfMoved​(Piece movingPiece,
                              Square target)
        Checks wherever the own king would be in a check-situation if a given piece would be moved to a given target square
        Parameters:
        movingPiece - the piece that would be moved
        target - the square the piece would be moved to
        Returns:
        true if Piece would allow the king to be in a check-situatio, false if move is safe for king

      • attackingKing

        public boolean attackingKing​(Piece attacker)
        Checks if a given piece is attaking the king of the opposite color
        Parameters:
        attacker - the piece that should be checked
        Returns:
        true if piece is attacking the king, false if not

      • attackersSettingCheck

        public java.util.List<Piece> attackersSettingCheck​(boolean kingIsWhite)
        Lists all pieces attacking the king of given color
        Parameters:
        kingIsWhite - true if king is white, false if black
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Pieces attacking the king

      • legalsToResolveCheck

        public java.util.List<Square> legalsToResolveCheck​(Piece piece)
        returns a list of squares that a given piece could move to to resolve a check situation
        Parameters:
        piece - Piece that is checked for possible 'resolve squares'
        Returns:
        List of squares that could resolve a check situation

      • isCheckMate

        public boolean isCheckMate​(boolean kingIsWhite)
        Checks if the King of a given color is 'checkmate'
        Parameters:
        kingIsWhite - true if king is white, false if king is black
        Returns:
        true if king is checkmate, false if not

      • noOneCanHelp

        private boolean noOneCanHelp​(boolean isWhite)
        Checks if any piece the given color could resolve the checksituation
        Parameters:
        isWhite - if pieces are white, false if black
        Returns:
        true if no pieces can help/resolve the check-situation, false if pices could resolve

      • inBetweenSquares

        protected java.util.List<Square> inBetweenSquares​(boolean kingIsWhite)
        Returns squares that are in the line of the attacker and the king
        Parameters:
        kingIsWhite - if attacked King is white, false if black
        Returns:
        List of squares that are in between, empty list if none found
